headline: Bank of America Gears Up For Q4 Print; Here Are The Recent Forecast Changes From Wall Street's Most Accurate Analysts
summary: Bank of America (NYSE:BAC) will release earnings for the fourth quarter before the opening bell on Wednesday, Jan. 14. Analysts expect the bank to report fourth-quarter earnings of 96 cents per share. That's up from 82 cents per share in the year-ago period. The consensus estimate for Bank of America’s quarterly revenue is $27.62 billion (it reported $25.35 billion last year), according to Benzinga Pro.
